summary: This document details the execution of a search warrant at a residence located at 9 East 71st Street, New York, on July 6, 2019. The warrant was issued in connection with investigations into sex trafficking of minors and included the collection of various evidentiary materials. The search was conducted by FBI agents and NYPD officers, and the document outlines the procedures followed during the search and the items recovered.

persons.name: Barbara Moses
persons.context: Judge Barbara Moses signed the search warrant authorizing the search of the premises.

persons.name: Marc A. Fernich
persons.context: Marc A. Fernich was provided with a copy of the search warrant and Receipt for Property after the search was completed.

persons.name: Amanda Young
persons.context: Amanda Young was one of the agents involved in the execution of the search warrant.

persons.name: Paul Byrne
persons.context: Paul Byrne participated in the execution of the search warrant.

persons.name: Christopher Serotta
persons.context: Christopher Serotta was involved in the search operation at the residence.

persons.name: Stacy Turansky
persons.context: Stacy Turansky participated in the execution of the search warrant.

connections.description: Judge Barbara Moses signed the search warrant, which was later provided to legal counsel Marc A. Fernich.
Amanda Young and Paul Byrne were both FBI agents involved in the search warrant execution.
Amanda Young and Christopher Serotta were both part of the team executing the search warrant.
Amanda Young and Stacy Turansky were involved in the same search operation.
Paul Byrne and Christopher Serotta were both FBI agents participating in the search.
Paul Byrne and Stacy Turansky were involved in the execution of the search warrant.
Christopher Serotta and Stacy Turansky were both part of the search team.

events.title: Search Warrant Execution
events.description: A search warrant was executed at 9 East 71st Street, New York, as part of an investigation into sex trafficking.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York 10021
keyFacts: The search warrant was issued on July 6, 2019, by Judge Barbara Moses.
The search was executed at approximately 6:15 PM on July 6, 2019.
The search was conducted by FBI agents and NYPD officers.
Several items of evidentiary value were located during the search.
A copy of the search warrant and Receipt for Property was provided to legal counsel Marc A. Fernich.
